summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1344, for the improvement of Howard Avenue North, in the City of Seattle, from Mercer Street to Roy Street, as established by Ordinance No. 10850, by grading the same, and by constructing wooden curbs, gutters, cross walks and concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 14992 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
